revised_title: Electrical Conductivity and the Thermocline of the Moon: A New Appraisal from Space Missions and Laboratory Analyses
tldr: This article discusses the electrical conductivity of lunar materials and its relation to the Moon's interior temperature. The authors use laboratory experiments and data from space missions to create a temperature profile of the Moon's interior, supporting the idea of a hot Moon. They also explore the effects of iron content and oxidation state on the electrical conductivity of lunar materials.
